subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Vinny Testaverde, who came out of retirement last season to join the Jets, was signed by New England on Tuesday. The move came after the Patriots lost consecutive games for the first time since 2002.
snippet: Vinny Testaverde, who came out of retirement last season to join the Jets, was signed by New England on Tuesday. The move came after the Patriots lost consecutive games for the first time since 2002.
